expected_goal: Plan activities based on weather and send a summary email
expected_thoughts: Get the current weather for London for the next 3 days
Analyze the weather forecast to check for rain
Find indoor activities in London if it will rain
Save indoor activities to a file if it will rain
Find outdoor activities in London if it will not rain
Save outdoor activities to a file if it will not rain
Summarize the plan based on the weather and activities
Send an email summarizing the plan
